mapper.select: select info.mem_no mem_no,(select artist_name from artist_info_tb where mem_no=info.mem_no) artist_name,info.art_no art_no,info.art_name art_name,info.art_material art_material, info.art_theme art_theme,info.art_size1 art_size1,info.art_size2 art_size2, info.art_year art_year,info.art_pic art_pic, info.art_exp art_exp,info.art_tag1 art_tag1,info.art_tag2 art_tag2,info.art_tag3 art_tag3, info.auc_start auc_start,nvl2(info.auc_bid,info.auc_bid,info.auc_start) auc_bid,info.auc_buy auc_buy,sell.art_sell art_sell, round((sell.art_time-sysdate)*24*60*60) art_time from art_info_tb info inner join art_sell_tb sell on info.art_no=sell.art_no where info.art_no = (select art_no from (select wish.art_no,count(wish.art_no) art_count, row_number() over(order by count(wish.art_no) desc) rank from wish_list_tb wish inner join art_sell_tb art on wish.art_no=art.art_no where art_sell='sale' group by wish.art_no order by art_count desc) where rank=1) and sell.art_time > sysdate
